value.title: Module 1: Overview (Part 2/3) | Power BI Developer in a Day
value.excerpt: In this video, you’ll learn about Power BI core concepts, including the Power BI service, workspaces, datasets, reports, dashboards, and Q&A. This is video 4 of 20.    The Power BI Developer in a Day online course empowers you as an app developer with the technical knowledge required to embed Power BI

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 20: Beyond Report Development - Part 1
value.excerpt: In this video, we describe how to publish reports to the Power BI service, and also cover consuming, delivering, and embedding paginated reports. Finally, we discuss when it's a good choice to create a paginated report instead of a Power BI report.  The Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day online course

value.title: How to Create a Date or Calendar Table and Dimension in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Date dimension or calendar table is one of the most important dimensions in any BI system. In this video, I'm showing you how easy is to create a date dimension using Power Query. value.title: How to Reduce the Size of Power BI file in a few Steps
value.excerpt: One of the performance considerations of a Power BI file is to reduce the size of it as much as possible. value.title: How to use AddColumns function in DAX and Power BI

value.title: Power BI Filter pane   Customize the Color Font and Style
